metadata.title: CVE-2023-52168 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The NtfsHandler.cpp NTFS handler in 7-Zip before 24.01 (for 7zz) contains aheap-based buffer overflow that allows an attacker to overwrite two bytesat multiple offsets beyond the allocated buffer size: buffer+512*i-2, fori=9, i=10, i=11, etc.

criterions.comment: 7zip package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
